          <title>
            <string language="sl">Značilnosti elektromagnetnega  valovanja</string>
            <string language="en">Characterize the electromagnetic wave</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kennzeichnen Sie die elektromagnetische Welle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caractérisez l'onde électromagnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caracterize a onda eletromagnética</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratterizzi l'onda elettromagnetica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρακτηρίστε το ηλεκτρομαγνητικό κύμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caracterice la onda electromagnética</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vektorsko polje elekričnega polja vzdolž EM valovanja.</string>
            <string language="en">Vector field of an electric field along the EM wave.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">em valovanje</string>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektromagnetno valovanje</string>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vektor fangen von einem elektrischen 
auffangen entlang der EM Welle auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dirigez la zone d'un champ électrique le long de 
la vague de fin de support.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vector o campo de um campo elétrico ao longo da 
onda do EM.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vector il campo di un campo elettrico lungo l'onda
di EM.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διανυσματικό πεδίο ενός ηλεκτρικού πεδίου κατά 
μήκος του κύματος EM.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vector el campo de un campo eléctrico a lo largo 
de la onda del EM.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ondes électromagnétiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ondas eletromagnéticas</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
